Html:
hy ,

why i cant able to show or hide the grid lines in pdf  i use setShowGridLines(false/true) but i cant able to do this its woking fine in excel sheet before the saturday 25 i able but aafter that i download a new realesed code sonow its not working so give me solutions for the formatting of my pdf file

We have upgraded TCPDF, the underlying package for writing PDFs, but I didn't notice any difference other than some bug was fixed. Are you trying to show or hide gridelines in the PDF?

I'm afraid that you won't be able to show gridlines or any borders in PDF output by PHPExcel.
